container-title: ‘Kor’sarro Khan: Huntmaster’, ‘Black Iron’, ‘The Eighth Victory’, ‘The Sacrifice’ and ‘Bride of Khaine’. He hails from East Kilbride in Scotland, but lives and works in Nottingham. A BLACK LIBRARY PUBLICATION First published in Great Britain in 2015
title: Graeme Lyon is the author of the Space Marine Battles novella Armour of Faith and a host of Warhammer 40,000, Warhammer Age of Sigmar and Warhammer short stories including ‘The Carnac Campaign: Sky Hunter’

container-title: published in 2015 by Black Library, Games Workshop Ltd, Willow Road, Nottingham, NG7 2WS, UK. Produced by Games Workshop in Nottingham
